Reviews.Content: Good value for Money $$ 8 Jan 2008This is a true Aussie hospitality pad. I am long term guest and in fact still staying here. It is true that it is close to Redfern BUT it is equidistance to Newtown railway station which is a another vibrant village. The owners; Mark  Jason are friendly and the rooms are comfy. It is noisy at times but this is not exactly the Hilton in the city. I would recommend this place for budget travellers who wants to be away from the city (10 minutes) and to meet new friends in the TV room.Arumugam
Reviews.Author: shaun1970
